name: Max Payne
description: Max Payne is a man with nothing to lose--a fugitive undercover cop framed for murder, and now hunted by the cops and the mob.As Payne, you'll uncover plot twists, engage in dramatic 'bullet-time' firefights with thugs, and fight your way through an unforgiving New York blizzard.Max can wield a variety of weapons including pistols, submachine guns, shotguns, sniper rifles, grenades, and Molotov cocktails.Prepare yourself for an involving story combined with slick action.
